name: Malfunction (itch) (Joey Clemente)
description:
In this puzzle game, you play as a small creature on a space shuttle run by your company who has lost a big portion of your company's data. The only way to retrieve the data is to go around the shuttle and update the systems again, or is that the only option? - Made for UNC Game Jam -


- CONTROLS -

WASD to move

F to pick up boxes

E to interact with buttons and interfaces


- KNOWN BUGS - 

- Dont Spam the buttons on dialogue or in interaction menus, it will break things.

- If pressure plates are activated but doors don't open or things dont happen, it might be because both you and the box had interaction with pressure plate at the same time cancelling it out, to fix it, just make sure to put down your box before the pressure plate and push it on yourself.
